description: VPN tunnels allow users to create an encrypted link between their PC or mobile device and an outside network. The user can then browse the Internet while connected to the outside network, so their browsing history is linked to the network's IP address instead of their own.

24clan Inject is a free Android app that allows users to create VPN tunnels using various protocols, including SSH , HTTP , SSL , and WEBSOCKET. Users can then export their VPN tunnel settings in an ICLAN file, for use on other Android devices.
